name: ELF
overview: Cornelius, the protagonist of this story, could be considered a happy elf. He was not only healthy and young (he was barely over a hundred years old) but also he was deeply in love with a beautiful elf who reciprocated and whom he hoped to marry soon. However, a cruel character was going to disturb the happiness of the couple. The magician Necrilous needed an elf for his last spell and Elisa, our hero's young love, had the misfortune of becoming the one chosen to be boiled in the cauldron where the diabolical concoction was to be prepared. This is your story, how Cornelius the Elf ventures into the forest in search of his beloved. Will you be able to get it?
